a.dialog: those Chains and lock are actually cute little quiz games!
i Would have already taken all that delicious everything behind the door
but The chains require knowledge that is beyond my understanding!
see, I was never born with the ability to read! my Strong-suits are more about appearances
i Like to look fancy! see My tie?
enough About me, though; more About you!
look At the bottom left; you will Notice a book! clicking It will set the page on the bottom right!
wow! look At all that knowledge!
you Can scroll through the pages of the book using the arrows
but More than that, you can answer the quizzes and break the chains!
you Can answer the questions with the click one of the four buttons
no Matter how many times you fail, you can always answer again!
I do not recommend purposefully failing; Remember, this is all recorded and will reflect your learning
oh, And if you need a silent environment, the mute option is always available!
